title: Vintage Type
content:
Hi - I would love any help ID'ing this typeface! Also, any other suggestions for similar looking typefaces that have that vintage look would be fabulous. Thanks so much!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [type.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205013720/http:/typophile.com/files/type_43.jpg) | 34.11 KB |
author: laurabachman

comments.content: Not an ID, but suggestion for alternative: Wilma (check [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205013720/http:/www.type-o-tones.com/fonts.php?id=37&idstyle=76&spage=1) and [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205013720/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/type_o_tones/wilma_family/)) comes to mind.

This would be Archive Type Tilt:

[http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/archivetype/archive-tilt/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205013720/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/archivetype/archive-tilt/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/archivetype/archive-tilt/")
